definition: to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])

sentences.english: Sometimes, I'll suddenly choose one dish Ive never tried before.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，會忽然一閃念的選擇一盤我從未嘗試過的。

sentences.english: Just a hollow sound that echoes with each kick.
sentences.chinese: 只是每一下都帶了回聲的閃念。

sentences.english: The kicking never hurts me. There's no pain at all.
sentences.chinese: 這種閃念不痛苦，亦不傷人。

sentences.english: Just flash back, those who has lost any human perspective.
sentences.chinese: 閃念間回想下，那些人已經喪失了人性。

sentences.english: Though, those hopes, Was only temporary hope.
sentences.chinese: 雖然，那希望，也只是閃念的希望。
